protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Transcriptional regulator that binds the cAMP response element (CRE), a sequence present in many viral and cellular promoters. Isoforms are either transcriptional activators or repressors. Plays a role in spermatogenesis and is involved in spermatid maturation

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
